scripts.build: rimraf src/app/ppmk/embed/dist && vue-cli-service --mode development build && move dist src/app/ppmk/embed
scripts.go_mod: rimraf src/app/go.mod && rimraf src/app/go.sum && cd src/app && go mod init github.com/mt3hr/PutPullMock/src/app/ppmk && go mod tidy
scripts.install_app: npm run go_mod && rimraf src/app/ppmk/embed/dist && vue-cli-service --mode development build && move dist src/app/ppmk/embed && cd src/app && go install -ldflags "-H windowsgui"
scripts.install_server: npm run go_mod && rimraf src/app/ppmk/embed/dist && vue-cli-service --mode development build && move dist src/app/ppmk/embed && cd src/app/ppmk/ppmk_server && go install -tags="server"
